dtliExcerpt: Arguably the best new American drama since Annie Baker’s The Flick, David Adjmi’s Stereophonic shares both a hyper-naturalistic style and a sprawling three-hour running time with that 2013 masterwork.

keyPhrases.quote: Arguably the best new American drama since Annie Baker's The Flick
the best new American drama since Annie Baker’s The Flick
